Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Clairvoyance \Clair*voy"ance\, n. [F.] A power, attributed to some persons while in a mesmeric state, of discerning objects not perceptible by the senses in their normal condition. [1913 Webster]
clairvoyance n : apparent power to perceive things that are not present to the senses [syn: {second sight}, {extrasensory perception}, {E.S.P.}, {ESP}]
